ygData.subject: Re: Onyx in Freeport
ygData.msgSnippet: To give all of you a frame of reference, my level 10 Enchanter has jewelcraft skill of 37 and a success rate with jade of 3 out of 8.  All attempts were at
ygData.messageBody:
To give all of you a frame of reference, my level 10 Enchanter has
jewelcraft skill of 37 and a success rate with jade of 3 out of 8. All
attempts were at skill 36 or 37, as I did the stones in order. 37% is
a poor showing compared to some of the success rates I've heard.

Q d'E (Quentin of E'ci)

--- Magik <aarongb@...> wrote:
> From: "Magik" <aarongb@...>
